body_html:
I think adding retry logic to S3 support would be great.

I can't commit to have it done in the short term but will give it a try at some point once I have some spare time.

In the meantime, if anyone is interested in working on retry logic for S3 that would be excellent as well.

body:
I think adding retry logic to S3 support would be great.

I can't commit to have it done in the short term but will give it a try at some point once I have some spare time.

In the meantime, if anyone is interested in working on retry logic for S3 that would be excellent as well.
